tool_description: Get detailed information about players, champions, and more related to League of Legends. Check the About page for more details on every API available!

api_list.name: Get Player Details
api_list.description: Fetch details of a player based on their username. Note that the username is case-sensitive.

api_list.name: Get Random Champion
api_list.description: Randomly selects and returns a single champion from the list of champions.

api_list.name: Get Champion Tier List
api_list.description: Retrieve either a complete champion tier list or a specific tier list section based on your request.

optional_parameters.name: rank
optional_parameters.description: The rank to filter the tier list.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: The region for the tier list.

api_list.name: Get All League Ranks
api_list.description: Get a comprehensive list of League of Legends ranks and their corresponding player base.

api_list.name: Search For A Champion
api_list.description: Search through the champion list to return a specific champion or a list of champions based on your criteria.

optional_parameters.name: releaseDate
optional_parameters.description: Filter by the champion's release date.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the champion to search for.

optional_parameters.name: resource
optional_parameters.description: The resource used by the champion (e.g., mana, energy).

optional_parameters.name: rp
optional_parameters.description: The amount of RP (Riot Points) the champion costs.

optional_parameters.name: blueEssence
optional_parameters.description: The amount of Blue Essence the champion costs.

optional_parameters.name: attribute
optional_parameters.description: Filter by champion attributes (e.g., Assassin, Tank).

api_list.name: Get Random Item
api_list.description: Randomly selects and returns a single item from the list of items.

api_list.name: Search For A Item
api_list.description: Search through the item list to return a specific item or a list of items based on your criteria.

optional_parameters.name: itemSynergy
optional_parameters.description: Filter items by synergy with other items.

optional_parameters.name: price
optional_parameters.description: Filter items based on their price.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the item to search for.
